sentence.Network_en: Everybody knew that something awful was afoot.
sentence.Network_cn: 大家都知道可怕的事近在眼前。

sentence.Network_en: There are plans afoot to increase taxation.
There is a scheme afoot to improve recreational facilities in the area.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一项改善本地区娱乐设施的计划正在进行.

list.abs: But bigger changes are also afoot ., 不过 , 更大的变化也在酝酿之中.
But bigger changes are also afoot ., 但更大的变化还在进行中.
There ' s something afoot here , but I don ' t know what it is ., 这里有什么东西不对劲 , 但我不知道到底是什么.
说出5个与go有关的词组_百度知道 ... go-go dancer 表演摇摆舞的人 go afoot 走路去 Go ahead 前进, 有进展; 继续干下去.
it is good to go afoot with a horse in hand ., 有马牵在手 , 步行最悠闲.
the li family went to the park afoot ., 李家一家人走路到公园去.

encyclopedia.content: 常做表语 ①徒步 ②活动着，在进行中。 例：set a project~开始执行计划 the work is well~工作在顺利进行中。

entry.tran: 进行中的；正在发生的；酝酿中的
entry.def: If you say that a plan or scheme is afoot, it is already happening or being planned, but you do not know much about it.

example.ex: Everybody knew that something awful was afoot.
example.tran: 大家都知道可怕的事近在眼前。

sentences.sentence: "she was afoot when I saw her this morning"
"quail are hunted either afoot or on horseback"

auth_sentence.content: Sam knows what's afoot, by God he knows it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sam knows what's afoot, by God he knows it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sam knows what's afoot, by God he knows it.

auth_sentence.content: The lama and Mahbub Ali, both afoot, walking cautiously.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lama and Mahbub Ali, both afoot, walking cautiously.

auth_sentence.content: Seismic movements are afoot in education.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Seismic movements are afoot in education.

sentences.en: There’s something afoot here, but I don’t know what it is.
sentences.cn: 这里有什么东西不对劲，但我不知道到底是什么。

sentences.en: A plan was afoot to seize power.
There is a scheme afoot to improve recreational facilities in the area.
sentences.cn: 有一项改善本地区娱乐设施的计划正在进行。

sentences.en: Moves are afoot to increase car insurance premiums.
sentences.cn: 现正在酝酿提高汽车的保险费。

sentences.en: Plans are afoot to stage a new opera.
sentences.cn: 上演一部新歌剧的计划正在酝酿之中。
